import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const HomePageBox = ({ pic, text, link }) => { const [hoverIng, setHovering] = useState(false) console.log("called") return (
{console.log("hovering" + hoverIng); setHovering(true)})} onMouseLeave={(()=>{setHovering(false)})} onClick={(()=>{window.location = link})} // onMouseOut={(()=>{console.log("no longer hovering");setHovering(false)})} className="rounded-md h-1/3 flex border-opacity-100 border-t-4 hover:border-gray-600 mt-20 hover:border-4 border-red-600 w-1/3 ml-3 mr-3 mx-auto relative z-50 duration-200 cursor-pointer duration-1000">

{setHovering(true)})} className={`${hoverIng === true ? ` rounded-b-lg mx-auto bg-gray-600 bg-opacity-95 text-red-600 font-light duration-700 px-8 py-3 z-50 text-xl font-semibold border-gray-700 border-b-2 border-l-2 border-t-2 mt-20 h-1/4 border-r-2`: `border-opacity-99 rounded-sm bg-opacity-90 border-red-600 border-b-2 border-l-2 border-r-2 text-xl font-semibold px-8 mx-auto mt-20 h-1/4 bg-red-600 text-gray-600 duration-700`}`}> {text}

) } export default HomePageBox;
